chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
leA: A -> A -> Prop

Goal:
forall (x : List) (a b : A), Descl (x ++ Cons a Nil) -> ltl (x ++ Cons a Nil) (Cons b Nil) -> ltl x (Cons b Nil)

Premises:
Notation ltl := (Ltl A leA)
Notation Nil := nil
Notation Cons := cons
Notation List := (list A)
Notation Descl := (Desc A leA)
desc_end : forall (a b : A) (x : List), Descl (x ++ Cons a Nil) /\ ltl (x ++ Cons a Nil) (Cons b Nil) -> clos_trans A leA a b
desc_tail : forall (x : List) (a b : A), Descl (Cons b (x ++ Cons a Nil)) -> clos_trans A leA a b
desc_prefix : forall (x : List) (a : A), Descl (x ++ Cons a Nil) -> Descl x
app_inj_tail : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a b : A), x ++ a :: nil = y ++ b :: nil -> x = y /\ a = b
left_prefix : forall x y z : List, ltl (x ++ y) z -> ltl x z
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Ltl_sind : forall (A : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Ltl_ind : forall (A : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Lt_hd : forall (A : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (a b : A), leA a b -> forall x y : list A, Ltl A leA (a :: x) (b :: y)
in_inv : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b (a :: l) -> a = b \/ In b l
Inductive Ltl (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Lt_nil : forall (a : A) (x : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA nil (a :: x) | Lt_hd : forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (b :: y) | Lt_tl : forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) Arguments Relation_Operators.Ltl _%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_hd _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_tl _%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive Ltl (A : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Lt_nil : forall (a : A) (x : list A), Ltl A leA nil (a :: x) | Lt_hd : forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, Ltl A leA (a :: x) (b :: y) | Lt_tl : forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Ltl A leA x y -> Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) Arguments Ltl _%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Lt_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Lt_hd _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Lt_tl _%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
right_prefix : forall x y z : List, ltl x (y ++ z) -> ltl x y \/ (exists y' : List, x = y ++ y' /\ ltl y' z)
Record div_theory (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cadd cmul : C -> C -> C) (phi : C -> R) (cdiv : C -> C -> C * C) : Prop := mkdiv_th { div_eucl_th : forall a b : C, let (q, r) := cdiv a b in req (phi a) (phi (cadd (cmul b q) r)) } Arguments Ring_theory.div_theory [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments Ring_theory.mkdiv_th [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
dist_Desc_concat : forall x y : List, Descl (x ++ y) -> Descl x /\ Descl y
Inductive Add (A : Type) (a : A) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Add_head : forall l : list A, Add a l (a :: l) | Add_cons : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l') Arguments Add [A]%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Add_head [A]%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Add_cons [A]%type_scope [a] _ [l l']%list_scope

Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Field_theory.cross_product_eq : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> (forall p q : R, req p q -> req (rinv p) (rinv q)) -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall a b c d : R, ~ req b rO -> ~ req d rO -> req (rmul a d) (rmul c b) -> req (rdiv a b) (rdiv c d)
Desc_ind : forall (A : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), leA x y -> Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Desc A leA l -> P l
Desc_sind : forall (A : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), leA x y -> Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
dist_aux : forall z : List, Descl z -> forall x y : List, z = x ++ y -> Descl x /\ Descl y
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = a :: nil -> x = nil /\ y = a :: nil \/ x = a :: nil /\ y = nil
Add_cons : forall (A : Type) (a x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l')
d_conc : forall (A : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) (l : list A), leA x y -> Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)
Inductive Desc (A : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := d_nil : Desc A leA nil | d_one : forall x : A, Desc A leA (x :: nil) | d_conc : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), leA x y -> Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil) Arguments Desc _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments d_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments d_one _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments d_conc _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _%list_scope

Inductive Desc (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := d_nil : Relation_Operators.Desc A leA nil | d_one : forall x : A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x :: nil) | d_conc : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil) Arguments Relation_Operators.Desc _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_one _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_conc _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _%list_scope

lel_tail : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l m : list A), lel (a :: l) (b :: m) -> lel l m
VectorDef.to_list = fun (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A n) => (fix fold_right_fix (n0 : nat) (v0 : VectorDef.t A n0) (b : list A) {struct v0} : list A := match v0 with | VectorDef.nil _ => b | VectorDef.cons _ a n1 w => a :: fold_right_fix n1 w b end) n v nil : forall (A : Type) (n : nat), VectorDef.t A n -> list A Arguments VectorDef.to_list {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
